EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Email Reminder - Munich
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: See you Thursday for the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop in Munich
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up this Thursday in Munich. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, October 23, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) 5:30pm - 7:00pm Cocktail Networking Reception Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/munich>
EMC Deutschland GmbH Osterfeldstrasse 84 Ismaning 85737 Map and Driving Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/place/EMC+Deutschland+GmbH/@50.164874,8.532845,17z>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact us at info@pivotal.io <mailto:info@pivotal.io>
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
